wikipedia_page.main: Myles Walter Ponsonby CBE (12 September 1924 – 1 February 1999), was a British soldier, intelligence officer, diplomat and politician. He was Ambassador to Mongolia from 1974 to 1977.

response: Former Air Vice Marshal John Ponsonby is the son of officer, diplomat and politician Myles Ponsonby, and a grandson of Victor Coope Ponsonby, the fourth son of the Hon. Edwin Charles William Ponsonby.

*Myles Ponsonby CBE (1924–1999), British soldier, intelligence officer, diplomat and politician
Ponsonby was born on 8 August 1955 to Myles Ponsonby (1924–1999) and Ann Maynard. Charles Ponsonby, 2nd Baron de Mauley, was his great-great-grandfather. He has two sisters.
